entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Port Colborne
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then flurries at times heavy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
